general.invalidTokenError: We are sorry, your session has run out. Please login again.

loginDialog.submitLoginIncorrectError: Combination of username and password was incorrect.
loginDialog.submitLoginOtherError: An error occurred, we are sorry.

registerDialog.firstNameFieldLengthError: The password must be at most 20 characters long.
registerDialog.lastNameFieldLengthError: The password must be at most 20 characters long.
registerDialog.emailFieldValidError: Must be a valid e-mail address.
registerDialog.phoneNumberValidError: Must be a valid phone number.
registerDialog.passwordFieldRegexError: The password must contain at least 1 upper-case, lower-case, special character and number.
registerDialog.passwordFieldMinLengthError: The password must be at least {n} characters long.
registerDialog.passwordFieldMaxLengthError: The password must be at most {n} characters long.
registerDialog.passwordConfFieldRegexError: The password must contain at least 1 upper-case, lower-case, special character and number.
registerDialog.passwordConfFieldMinLengthError: The password must be at least {n} characters long.
registerDialog.passwordConfFieldMaxLengthError: The password must be at most {n} characters long.
registerDialog.addressLine1FieldLengthError: The address line must be at most 40 characters long.
registerDialog.cityFieldLengthError: The city must be at most 40 characters long.
registerDialog.checkboxTermsConditions: Do you accept the terms and conditions?
registerDialog.checkboxTermsConditionsRequiredError: You have to accept the terms and conditions.
registerDialog.submitRegOtherError: An error occurred, we are sorry.

registrationVerification.body1: We would like to welcome you on board of Mysellum.
registrationVerification.body2: Please verify your e-mail address to finish the onboarding process. We have sent you an e-mail containing a verification code.
registrationVerification.verifyRegOtherError: An error occurred, we are sorry.

forgotPassword.headline: Forgot password
forgotPassword.infoAlert: If you have forgotten your password or your access has been blocked, you can request a password reset email below by providing your mail address as well as your birthdate.
forgotPassword.successfullySentBody: E-Mail was successfully sent! Please check your mailbox and follow the contained link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.sendMailOtherError: An error occurred, we are sorry.
forgotPassword.sendMailSuccess: E-Mail was successfully sent to your address.

passwordReset.headline: Password reset
passwordReset.infoAlert: Now you can assign a new password. Make sure to use at least 8 characters, including at least one number, one special character, one lowercase and one uppercase letter to be well protected.
passwordReset.successfullyChangedBody: Your password was successfully changed! You can now login with your new password. Have fun on our platform!
passwordReset.successfullyChanged: Password was successfully changed. You can now login with your new password.
passwordReset.checkInvalidError: Password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request the passwort reset e-mail again or contact our customer support via the contact form.
passwordReset.resetOtherError: An error occurred, we are sorry.

searchPickup.headline: Stores in your area
searchPickup.noStoresError: We are sorry, we could not find a suitable store for your search criteria.

searchDelivery.noStoresError: We are sorry, we could not find a suitable store for your search criteria.

storeProfile.productsLoadingError: We could not load the store's products, we're sorry.
storeProfile.emptyReviewList: There are no reviews for this store yet. Why don't you leave the first one?
storeProfile.reviewsLoadingError: We are sorry, apparently there was an error on our side during loading the store's reviews.
storeProfile.thresholdShippingText2: but free from a purchase value of
storeProfile.storeLoadingError: We could not load the store, we're sorry.

activationSteps.headline: Activation
activationSteps.notActivatedLabel: Your store is not activated yet and therefore not visible to customers.
activationSteps.activatedLabel: Congratulations! Your store is activated and visible to customers.

profileStep.headline: Profile
profileStep.activatedLabel: The profile information of your store is complete.
profileStep.notActivatedLabel: You need to completeley fill out your stores profile in order to activate your store.

productsStep.headline: Products
productsStep.activatedLabel: You have registered at least one product in your store.
productsStep.notActivatedLabel: You have to register at least one product in order to be visible to customers.

shippingStep.headline: Shipping
shippingStep.notActivatedLabel: You did not register shipping information yet.

paymentStep.headline: Payment
paymentStep.activatedLabel: You have registered a payment method for your store.
paymentStep.notActivatedLabel: You did not register a payment method for your store yet.

productListItem.notificationTooltip: Get a notification when the product is available again

errors.maxLength: The product title must be at most 30 characters long.
errors.minLength: The product title must be at least 5 characters long.

description.label: Short Description
description.placeholder: Will be shown in the store profile

errors.maxLength: The product description must be at most 200 characters long.
errors.minLength: The product description must be at least 20 characters long.

longDescription.label: Long Description
longDescription.placeholder: Will be shown in the product details view

errors.maxLength: The product long description must be at most 1000 characters long.

errors.fileSize: The image file is too large.

errors.required: The quantity type of the product is required.
The quantity value of the product is required.

storeProfile.headline: Store Profile
storeProfile.info: Here you can edit the basic information of your store. Click on the save button at the bottom, when you are done.

location.headline: Location
location.info: Here you can edit the address of your store. Please be aware that stores addresses have to be unique. Click on the save button at the bottom, when you are done.
location.iconInfo: You need to refresh the page to see your updated marker icon in the map.
location.iconHelp: Choose an icon that most accurately symbolizes your store. This will be used to display it on the map.
